item.description:
Please note that this will only be held if the weather cooperates. So cross your fingers and paws that the sun shines on Saturday.

The yard is fully enclosed and all pugs can play off leash and have lots of fun.... but we live on a very busy street so hang on to the pups closely until you are in the yard.

Also.... Linda Kay (from "Paws for Applause") will be there for grooming and nail clipping. She charges only $10 per pug... A great deal

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: Backyard Halloween bash.... Costumes optional.
